DataElement.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Social Activities Past 6 Months Change in Socializing Due to Change in Physical Health or Emotional Condition Score 5 Point Scale
DataElement.preferredDefinition: A person's stated perception of how much time during the past 6 months their level of social activity has changed because of a change in their physical or emotional condition, using a 5 point Likert scale.

DataElementConcept.preferredName: Medical Outcomes Study Social Activities Past 6 Months Change in Socializing Due to Change in Physical Health or Emotional Condition Score
DataElementConcept.preferredDefinition: A survey of multiple dimensions of support, representing the social activities scale._A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._Interactions with one or more individuals, usually with a common purpose or with regards to a common topic of interest._Caused by or resulting from._The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character._The state of a person's physical and emotional well-being._A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ObjectClass.preferredDefinition: A survey of multiple dimensions of support, representing the social activities scale.

Concepts.definition: A survey of multiple dimensions of quality of life, representing the social activities scale.

Property.preferredName: Past 6 Months Change Socializing Due To Change Physical Health or Emotional Problems Score
Property.preferredDefinition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:Interactions with one or more individuals, usually with a common purpose or with regards to a common topic of interest.:Caused by or resulting from.:The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.:The state of a person's physical and emotional well-being.:A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

Concepts.definition: A period of time consisting of the 6 months before the present.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
Interactions with one or more individuals, usually with a common purpose or with regards to a common topic of interest.
The act of alteration or modification; changed or altered in form or character.
The state of a person's physical and emotional well-being.
A number or range of numeric values measuring performance, function, quality, or ability.

ConceptualDomain.preferredDefinition: Process and results associated with self-reported measures and instruments, surveys, other tools

ReferenceDocuments.name: Compared to your usual level
ReferenceDocuments.description: Compared to your usual level of social activity, has your social activity during the past 6 months decreased, stayed the same, or increased because of a change in your physical or emotional condition?

DataElement.origin: MOS:Medical Outcomes Study, Sherbourne, C. D., 1991 and Stewart, A. L. and J. E. Ware, Jr., Eds. 1992
